name: Quality
description: Evaluates if high-quality episodes (credibility >= 3) are being surfaced prominently
prompt_template:
Evaluate QUALITY on a scale of 1-10:

Are high-quality episodes being surfaced prominently?

## Recommendations
{recommendations_summary}

## Quality Indicators
Each episode has:
- Credibility score (1-5): Source authority, expertise level
- Insight score (1-5): Depth of analysis, actionable takeaways
- Quality score (0-1): Computed quality metric

## Evaluation Criteria
- Are top recommendations from credible sources (credibility >= 3)?
- Do recommendations offer substantive insights (not shallow content)?
- Is there a good mix of established and emerging voices?

## Scoring Guide
- 10: Top recommendations are all high-quality, credible sources
- 7-9: Mostly high-quality with 1-2 moderate entries
- 4-6: Mix of quality levels, some questionable sources
- 1-3: Low-quality content is prominent, credibility issues

Respond with JSON: {"score": <1-10>, "reasoning": "<brief explanation>"}
